facts.1: National Insurance Awareness Day is observed on June 28th to remind people to review their insurance policies and ensure they have adequate coverage.
facts.2: The day encourages individuals to assess their insurance needs, including health, auto, home, and life insurance.
facts.3: Insurance provides financial protection and peace of mind in case of unexpected events, making it an essential part of financial planning.

facts.1: National Tapioca Day celebrates the versatile and delicious tapioca, a starch extracted from the cassava root.
facts.2: Tapioca is commonly used in puddings, bubble tea, and as a thickening agent in various dishes.
facts.3: The day encourages people to enjoy tapioca in different forms and explore new recipes featuring this unique ingredient.

facts.1: International Body Piercing Day is celebrated on June 28th to honor the art and culture of body piercing.
facts.2: The day coincides with the birthday of Jim Ward, a pioneer in the modern body piercing movement.
facts.3: Body piercing has been practiced for thousands of years across various cultures and is a form of self-expression and adornment.
